This standard-grade dawnsilver shield (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10) is inscribed with the symbol of a deity dedicated to healing and medicine. The shield is designed for combat medics to aid combatants or adventurers in the midst of battle. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Healer's Toolkit]{Healer's tools} can be stored on the backside of this shield. This shield grants a +2 item bonus to Medicine checks.

Activateâ€”Adrenaline Boost 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You grant a medicinal boost to bring someone back into the fray. You Administer First Aid to stabilize an adjacent ally with the dying condition. On a success, they gain @Damage[(6d6+20)[healing]] Hit Points, can immediately @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Stand] as a free action, and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened] for 1 round. They can use this extra action only to Stride or Strike.
